name: Oboz Sapphire 8" Insulated B-Dry Winter Boots - Women's
description: Be ready for rainstorms or snowy streets. Cold-weather insulation and thermal insoles keep your feet warm happy. Waterproof-breathable membrane and a winter specific sole add protection and traction to snowy trails and icy sections of sidewalk.Waterproof suede leather and abrasion-resistant textile upper with B-Dry waterproof-breathable membrane.Asymmetrical collar for a comfortable, chafe-free stride.200 gram Thinsulate™ insulation.O-Fit thermal insole has multi-density EVA pods and a Mylar bottom sheet to reflect heat.EVA midsole with ESS plate provides cushioning and support and protects the forefoot from trail irregularities.TPU chassis adds torsional stability on uneven terrain.Oboz Swiftcurrent outsole provides traction.Heel kick lets you remove them without getting your hands mucky.
